official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for inclusion of the services of qualified audiologists under medicare.

summary.text: Audiological Rehabilitation Amendments - Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for outpatient communicative services under the supplementary medical insurance program. Defines "outpatient communicative services" as speech pathology and audiology services furnished by a provider of services or other health agency to an individual referred by a physician.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for inclusion of the services of qualified audiologists under medicare.
